mapper.insert:
insert into TC_WDJ_FILE
CDANHAO,
CBARCODENO,
CPRODUCENO,
CDC,
CHUOJIANO,
IQTY,
ICKQTY,
TC_WDJ20,
TC_WDJ21,
TC_WDJ200,
CFLAG,
TC_WDJ51,
TC_WDJ52,
TC_WDJ53,
TC_WDJ54,
CWHCODE,
#{cdanhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cbarcodeno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cproduceno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cdc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{chuojiano,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{iqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{ickqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{tcWdj20,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{tcWdj21,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tcWdj200,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tcWdj51,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tcWdj52,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tcWdj53,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tcWdj54,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cwhcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select a.cdanhao,a.cbarcodeno,a.cproduceno,a.cwhcode,a.chuojiano,a.iqty,a.ickqty,a.cdc,a.tc_Wdj21,a.tc_Wdj20,b.fickqty,#{centre} as centre from ${centre}.tc_wdj_file a left join ( select CBARCODENO,CDANHAO,CPRODUCENO,sum(ickqty) as fickqty from ${centre}.tc_wdja_file group by CBARCODENO,CDANHAO,CPRODUCENO )b on a.CDANHAO = b.CDANHAO and a.CPRODUCENO = b.CPRODUCENO and a.CBARCODENO = b.CBARCODENO where a.cdanhao = #{code_1}
